title: Aubergine and Company
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Raw, Mediterranean, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. As of March 2016, there are no vegan or vegetarian Mediterranean restaurants in SLC. Vegan choices include falafel, tabouleh, lentil soup, creamy tahini, fresh pitas, salads, sandwiches, smoothies and more. Order from menu or customize them. Most items are vegan or can be made vegan. Does not serve shawarma. Made-in-house cashew dressing, smoked tofu, roasted chickpeas, and other goodies are readily available, in addition to a large selection of clearly labeled vegan desserts (many raw) that also list the ingredients. As of March 2016, has one other location (Orem).
